First of all, you should try to recognize the things that you need training in. It is not possible for two opposite forces to mix together, but I will maintain it with my resurrected authority until you obtain all your power.
If you are ready to accept the Giant's power after developing your level, I will give you new power. Please devote yourself to the training, and remember that you are doing this for the ultimate power.
The powers that must be maintained until you receive my power are as follows:
